獑獑獑

獑字的基本解释

獑
chán
〔獑猢〕古书上说的腰以前黑而似猿的一种动物。

獑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chán］
［《廣韻》鋤銜切，平銜，崇。］
［《廣韻》士咸切，平咸，崇。］
兽名。猿属。

獑字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　獑； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页718第01
【廣韻】士咸切【集韻】鋤咸切，?音讒。【玉篇】獑猢，獸名。似猨。【廣韻】似猿而白。【集韻】或作螹。　又【廣韻】鋤銜切，音巉。義同。

獑字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
獑字的起名意思

暂无。

Cat
Basic explanation of words
Cat
chán
〔獑猢〕An animal whose waist was black and resembling an ape in ancient books.
Cat
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chán］
["Guangyun" hoe title cut, flat title, Chong. ]
["Guangyun" Shixianqie, Pingxian, Chong. ]
Animal name. Apes.
Cat
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Part 2] [Dog Character Department] 　獑; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 718 No. 01
[Guang Yun] Shixian cut [Ji Yun] Pick salty cut, slander. [Jade articles] 猢猢, animal name. It's like 猨. [Guang Yun] White like an ape. [Ji Yun] or as a scorpion.　 [Guang Yun] Hoe and cut, sound. The same meaning.
